mapper.select: SELECT s.sharding_id AS shardingId, s.record_id AS recordId, floor(count(s.sharding_id) / 2) AS 'time', max(t.scene_score) AS evaluationScore FROM tj_sharding_change_record s LEFT JOIN tj_test_single_scene_score t ON s.task_id = t.task_id AND s.case_id = t.case_id AND s.record_id = t.record_id AND t.test_type = 3 WHERE s.task_id = #{taskId} AND s.case_id = #{caseId} AND s.record_id = #{recordId} GROUP BY s.record_id, s.sharding_id ORDER BY min(s.id)
